actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the deductions for retirement savings shall be the lesser of 15 percent of the taxpayer's compensation or $7,500.

summary.text: Provides that the deduction for retirement savings under the Internal Revenue Code shall be the lesser of 15 percent of the taxpayer's compensation or $7,500 for each taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the deductions for retirement savings shall be the lesser of 15 percent of the taxpayer's compensation or $7,500.
